Frank Gutierrez, emergency management coordinator for Houston, sits next to a color-coded map of Harris County and the surrounding areas.

We don't try to get people to evacuate from wind damage.

Researchers call them `shadow evacuees,' people who follow along with those actually in the very vulnerable areas.
Rita cast a long shadow, enticing an estimated 2.5 million Houstonians to leave.
